attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As has been finally exposed with the Construction Firms scandal. The blacklisting of workers has been going on in secret, on a massive scale for years. Therefore, as someone who has also suffered the detrimental effects of having had this secret and vile practice done to myself, and having been told that there is no proof that this is occurring. I petition the Government to finally "do the right thing", and bring in specific and effective Legislation to outlaw this vile practice and to make it a Criminal offence for anyone caught doing it.
